oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gay Street
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thompson Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gay Street looking north, Knoxville, TN. 1935. At left: Mercantile Building, Baum's Home of Flowers, Weaver's "Good Things to Eat," S.B. Newman Co. Printing, Bert Thompson Snap Shop, Schlitz sign, ___ Hat Shop, Good's Cafe, Hamilton Bank, Lane Drugs, Park National Bank. At right: S&W Cafeteria, Tennessee Theatre, partial view of Knoxville Power & Light sign. Fountain City bus and cars on street.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Streets; Motion picture theaters; Business enterprises; Automobiles; Buses; Banks;
